it.unipr.netsec.simulator.scheduler

Class Scheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.netsec.simulator.scheduler.Scheduler

  • public class Scheduler
extends java.lang.Object
    A scheduler. It schedules and sequentially executes events, here called tasks (SchedulerTask). Tasks are ordered based on the task attribute (time). The attribute time is just used by tasks and scheduler as a virtual time; it doesn't have (and does not need to have) any reference to the real system time.
